entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is mentioned as the one handing round a box of after-dinner mints. She is described as being in the dining room.

entities.name: barn owl
entities.description: The barn owl is described as swooping through the dining room window and dropping a letter on Mrs Mason's head.

entities.name: mrs mason
entities.description: Mrs Mason is mentioned as having a letter dropped on her head by the barn owl.

relationships.description: The barn owl swooped through the dining room window and dropped a letter on Mrs Mason's head.
Aunt Petunia was in the same room as the barn owl when it swooped through the window.
